thread.title: Noel Hickey
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Noel Hickey

author: Noel Hickey
title: Noel Hickey
text: Good service & goods received on committed date. Only enhancement that i would like to see is some real time tracking of the shipment. Interrogating the UPS website resulted in after the fact data being shared. In order to receive the shipment on the designated day I needed to be at home for the duration or at least until the driver actually showed up. having the ability to know that the driver would be with me in the next hour would have made the experience of delivery day all the more enjoyable. Not essentially a criticism of ECCO but feedback for ECCO's designated carrier.
